imdb.title: Isekai Quartet
imdb.plot: The worlds of isekai sagas collide and cross over, resulting in comical chaos.

episodes.title: Join the Fight! Transfer Student
episodes.plot: The students have now finally settled into their new lives, but a new student has come to the school, and his name is... "Shield"?

episodes.title: Sneak In! The Principal's Office
episodes.plot: Life's great in this world, except for one thing: there's no alcohol! When the students sneak into the principal's office to get their fix from his stash, they run into more than they bargained for.

episodes.title: Uh-Oh! Detention!
episodes.plot: This new world is a great place: no fighting, no danger, and the classes are easy. But you REALLY don't want to get detention!

episodes.title: Pinch! Test of Learning
episodes.plot: It's time for a test! Everybody expects Ains to score highly, but... he never even passed middle school!

episodes.title: Work Hard! Valentine's Day
episodes.plot: It's Valentine's Day, which means it's time to give chocolate to the boy you like! But an unexpected face makes an appearance...

episodes.title: Clash! Dodgeball
episodes.plot: It's time for a battle to settle the most important question of all: what do you put on your chicken wings?

episodes.title: Excitement! Physicals Day
episodes.plot: It's time for physicals, and everybody's ready to get naked and get on the scale! Who will be brave enough to go peek at the opposite sex?

episodes.title: Challenge! Part-Time Job
episodes.plot: Visha's been working overtime lately. But what does she need the money for?

episodes.title: Investigate! First Errand
episodes.plot: It's time for a play! But what kind of play should they put on? Filo will find out!

episodes.title: Rise Up! School Festival
episodes.plot: It's time for a school festival! But something is lurking outside the school...

episodes.title: The Show Begins! Showtime
episodes.plot: The Destroyer heads for the school while Ram makes her theatrical debut as Cinderella.

episodes.title: Come Together! Quartet
episodes.plot: Mysterious buttons appear in the worlds of Tanya the Evil, KonoSuba, Overlord, and Re:Zero. When the characters push them, they're taken to a place they'd never imagined...

episodes.title: Tension! Introductions
episodes.plot: Now that everybody's settled in, it's time for the first day of school, which means everybody has to introduce themselves.

episodes.title: Deadlock! Classmates
episodes.plot: The students begin to wonder about why they are here, and what this school really is. Tanya, in particular, has a theory about Ains...

episodes.title: Encounter! Classmates
episodes.plot: The students realize that they're all from other worlds, and begin to share their backgrounds. But some are luckier than others...

episodes.title: Explosion! Talent Show
episodes.plot: It's time for the talent show, but none of the students are talented at all. The KonoSuba crowd in particular...

episodes.title: Decision! Class Rep
episodes.plot: It's time to pick the class rep! But Aqua doesn't want Ains to do it, and Albedo doesn't want Aqua anywhere near the job.

episodes.title: Carry Out! Class Rep
episodes.plot: Emilia's the class rep now, but it's really hard. But she wants to do her best!

episodes.title: Prepare! Field Trip
episodes.plot: It's time for a field trip to the beach, and the gang's getting ready. But who wants to see Kazuma in a swimsuit?

episodes.title: Enjoy! Field Trip
episodes.plot: The field trip is here, and it's great! Everybody's at the beach and having a great time. But Tanya hears something that makes her upset...

episodes.title: Join In! Rivals
episodes.plot: It's time for Field Day, and Roswaal hints that whoever wins will get to go home. But then they meet their opponents...

episodes.title: Work Together! Field Day
episodes.plot: Field Day is here, and it's lots of fun for everyone. There's tug of war, scavenger hunts... and giant robots?!

episodes.title: Band Together! Quartet
episodes.plot: The mobile fortress "Destroyer" has joined the last game! It's up to the quartet to grab its headband and win the game.
